species.name: Stegodon ganesa
species.description: Large proboscidean with straight tusks, ancestor of modern elephants. Key indicator of Upper Siwalik fauna.

species.name: Sivatherium giganteum
species.ecology: Large giraffid with palmate ossicones, mixed feeder
species.description: Largest giraffid ever to exist, with four horns and massive build. Widespread across Siwalik deposits.

species.name: Hipparion antelopinum
species.ecology: Grassland grazer, indicator of open savanna environments
species.description: Three-toed horse common in Miocene-Pliocene. Arrival marks 'Hipparion Event' in Siwalik stratigraphy.

species.name: Crocodylus palaeindicus
species.ecology: Apex aquatic predator in Siwalik river systems
species.description: Massive crocodilian reaching up to 7m length. Found in fluvial sandstones throughout Siwalik sequence.

species.name: Hexaprotodon sivalensis
species.description: Ancestral hippopotamus species. Presence indicates perennial river systems in Siwalik paleoenvironments.

species.name: Megantereon cultridens
species.ecology: Apex predator with elongated canines for hunting megafauna
species.description: Medium-sized machairodont with distinctive saber teeth. Important carnivore in Upper Siwalik ecosystems.
